title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2739/95 of 28 November 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1370/95 laying down detailed rules for implementing the system of export licences in the pigmeat sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2739/95 of 28 November 1995 amending Regulation (EC)  No 1370/95 laying down detailed rules for implementing the system of export licences in the pigmeat  sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the  Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 November 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
